name: Super Taiwanese Baseball League
storyline: This game is the sequel to and an improvement upon the Taiwanese game World Pro Baseball for the Mega Drive (itself a copycat of Power League '93 for the PC Engine) featuring fully licensed teams and players from Chinese Professional Baseball League. It features big animations of certain plays and digitized samples of cheering crowds.
summary: Super Taiwanese Baseball League for the Super A'can

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Super Chinese Baseball League (超級中華職棒聯盟) for Super A'can: Introduction and Dragons vs. Elephants
